options: Being at your best with every customer.

intro:
To be an effective customer service professional, you must talk at a speed that allows you to be clearly understood.

Read the text aloud on the next screen and Blink will time you.
text: Blink transforms employee training from a time-consuming chore into a fast-paced enjoyable experience of triumph. Blink presents concepts and procedures in small easily-learned units. Employees enjoy Blink Training and can fit it into their day to day lives. Let us transform your workplace training in the blink of an eye.
feedback: You’re speaking too slowly. Speed up so you use less of the customer’s valuable time.
Great work! Your speed is within a good range. You’ll be treating your customers well.
You’re speaking too quickly. Slow down so that customers can better understand what you’re saying.

message:
The FDA regulates how pharmaceutical products are marketed and sold. The agency requires that all promotional materials be:
  • On label
  • Truthful
  • Not misleading
  • Balanced in terms of benefits and risks
  • Inclusive of full prescribing information

options.text: Blink is a new system for training employees.
Blink can cure migraines, shine your shoes and make perfect waffles!
Blink makes learning more of a part of each employee’s life.
All current corporate training is boring and ineffective.
Blink merges corporate training and casual gaming to create casual training.
